amendment.description: To provide additional funding for the Office on Violence Against Women.

action.text: Amendment SA 3233, previously agreed to, was further modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3233 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3233 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S12713, S12748-12749; text: CR S12713) To provide additional funding for the Office on Violence Against Women.
